text: Christopher Mayer (born George Charles Mayer III; February 21, 1954 â€“ July 23, 2011), also known as Chip Mayer, was an American actor. He was best known for playing Vance Duke on The Dukes of Hazzard for 19 episodes during season 5. Mayer was found dead in his Los Angeles home in Sherman Oaks on July 23, 2011 at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2011 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Christopher Mayer
